name: 零岁的星光
description:
"Want to take a look at the end of the world.
I know there are no bright stars there.
I know that there is no bright star, but there is a love between you and me that has not bloomed."

Game Description


"Amore~4,2 anni luce"is a short modern emotional e-novel about a boy who grew up as a loner, "Yu Qing", who was adopted by his doctor "sister" in an orphanage, and the series of experiences he had with her in life and growing up. Is the love between his sister and him a family love? Or was it a love that ultimately failed to form?

Character Introduction

"Sister"
Height: 172cm
Birthday: May 4th
Hobbies: Japanese literature, mystery novels, listening to old songs from the olden days of various countries
A doctor in the newly established young department of oncology surgery at Youlan University Hospital (YUH), and has just become the youngest deputy chief physician in the department.


"Dr.Dong"
Height:169cm
Birthday:July 7
Interests:History of medicine, medical-related novels, love of lecturing
She is a psychiatrist at Yulan University Hospital (YUH) and a part-time lecturer in psychiatry at the Faculty of Medicine. She is very popular with students because of her interesting teaching style.

Game Features

    ※The exquisite scenery and CG graphics, together with the excellent performances, create an extremely beautiful stage for the game.
    ※The moving writing and story takes you through a hazy and twisted emotional entanglement.
    ※The main character has 2 sets of movements, 3 poses and 3 sets of costumes, and his vivid image jumps off the screen.
